page.title: 04THE M25 MOTORWAY
page.content: During construction of the{M25}local residents suffered from dust and excessive noise. In{February 1976}the {Maple Cross}to{Hunton Bridge}Section {was opened and}in{January 1985}a further section was opened linking this to the{M40 at Denham.}The road is built in a{cutting}at one section but this seems to{increase}noise to surrounding houses. Some people along the route sold their houses at{reduced {prices}to escape the{increased {noise.At Parkfield,}a new housing development next to the{M25,}houses sold quickly but some were reduced by {Â£1,000}because of the noise.The builders sandwiched{polystyrene between two fences to deaden the sound.In a survey{45%}of adults questioned moved to this area because of good access to motorways.{62%}use the M25{regularly.
